About Music Videos Gallery Contact

We are alternative rock band from Lviv, Ukraine.

Creators of M.O.N.O was four friends who’s addicted by nu­metal and rapcore from USA. 2010 was a year when we create our first song and EP’s. We take part in mini­-tour over West Ukraine. In 2011 we make our debut video on the song «End of your way». Old Friends Fest in Lviv was the last concert for the band, which we played in that band structure. In 2012 we released a song «Together» in support of the new EP and debut album in future. Unfortunately in the same year band was collapsed. Only 2 of us was ready to work with new material.

After 3 years without concerts we agreed to collect band together again. Our group members today is Bo (mc), Alex (vox), Davis (drums), Ros (bass-guitar), Dj Xed (turntables/samples), Knaff and Malysh (guitars). Our new genre is differ from style we played in 2010. We start our new music trip with festival in Lviv (Loudest V) and new song «On the edge» that was released in autumn 2015. Now we are working on new song that must be released this winter and video.

  • НА КРАЮ ( LIVE AT LOADFEST V ) 2015

  • CATHARSIS ( LIVE AT LOADFEST V ) 2015

  • КОНЕЦ ТВОЕГО ПУТИ ( OFFICIAL VIDEO ) 2011
